query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'in_progress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inProgress, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed FROM projects;
